channel.title: BL-80 on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in BL-80 on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 310
item.description: I-80 East approaching Exit 310 - BL-80/Curtis St. This is the western end of the Laramie business loop. The BL-80 shield is incorrectly displayed as an interstate shield.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 82
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 82 -US-50/South Lake Tahoe/Sacramento. Use right lanes for I-80 East to Reno.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 81 and Exit 82
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 81 - West Capitol Ave./Enterprise Blvd. Approaching Exit 82 - US-50/Sacramento. I-80 traffic use right lanes for Reno (Nevada).

item.title: BL-80/NV-535 West Approaching NV-225
item.description: BL-80/NV-535 West (Idaho Street) approaching NV-225 North (Mountain City Highway and Silver St.). Use NV-225 north (Mountain City Highway) to Boise (Idaho). Continue west on BL-80/NV-535 to Elko West. Turn left for Silver St.

item.title: End NV-305 North at BL-80/NV-304
item.description: End of NV-305 at BL-80/NV-304. Turn right on BL-80/NV-304 for Elko; turn left on BL-80/NV-304 for Winnemucca.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 180 at BL-80/NV-794
item.description: I-80 West (Exit 180) offramp at BL-80/NV-794. Turn left for BL-80/NV-794 to Winnemucca.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 2
item.description: I-80 East approaching Exit 2- BL-80/UT-58/Wendover.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 82
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 82 - BL-80/Capital City Freeway/Sacramento/US-50/South Lake Tahoe. Use right lanes for I-80 East to Reno. This is the western end of US-50.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 46 Offramp at NV-427
item.description: I-80 east Exit 46 offramp at NV-427. Use NV-427 north for Wadsworth and Pyramid Lake. Use NV-427 south, also signed as BL-80 for Fernley.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 82
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 82 - BL-80/Capital City Freeway/Sacramento/US-50/South Lake Tahoe. Use right lanes for I-80 East to Reno.

item.title: I-80 East - Approaching Exit 82
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 82 - BL-80/US-50/Capital City Freeway/Sacramento/South Lake Tahoe. For I-80 East/Reno use right lanes.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 81 and Exit 82
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 81 - West Capitol Ave./Enterprise Blvd. Approaching Exit 82 - BL-80/US-50/Capitol City Freeway/Sacramento/Lake Tahoe. I-80 traffic use right lanes for Reno.

item.title: BL-80/NV-289 at NV-794
item.description: BL-80/NV-289 (E. Second St.) at NV-794 (East Winnemucca Blvd.)

item.title: BL-80/NV-289 East at NV-794
item.description: BL-80/NV-289 east at NV-794. Continue on BL-80/NV-289 for I-80.

item.title: US-95 North/BL-80 in Winnemucca
item.description: BL-80 East/US-95 North (Winnemucca Blvd.) at US-95 north Melarkey St. Continue straight for BL-80 to Elko. Turn left for US-95 to Lakeview (OR) and Boise(ID).

item.title: I-80 East Approaching Exit 2
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 2 - Verdi. Use Exit 2 for Business Loop I-80.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 2
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 2 - Verdi. This is the first Nevada exit on I-80 eastbound.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 105 - Business Loop
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 105. Use Exit 105 for Business Loop.

item.title: I-80 Onramp Exit 310 - Curtis St.
item.description: BL-80 West at I-80 in Laramie. Turn right for I-80 west to Rawlins; proceed over freeway for I-80 east to Cheyenne.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 316
item.description: I-80 west to Rawlins at Exit 316, BL-80/US-30 West/Grand Ave.

item.title: BL-80 East at I-80 in Elko
item.description: Eastern end of Elko I-80 business loop at I-80 junction to Reno and Salt Lake

item.description: BL-80 West (Idaho Street) at NV-225 North. Use NV-225 north to Boise. Continue west on BL-80 to Elko West. Turn left for Silver St.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 102
item.description: I-80 East at Exit 102 - BL-80/Rock Springs. Next exit is College Drive which is unsigned. The exit after that is Exit 104 - US-191 North/Elk St. I-80/US-30 continues east towards Rawlins.
